name: OBSD - One Button Space Defence
description:
Control: 
Space or LMC or RMC.

Small 'backlore':
In 2222, greedy aliens decided to take over the Earth. And only you, the pilot of an experimental one-button protective spaceship, can stop them!

For 1-Button Jam 2022

Engine, art, sounds, music: 
Kaboom.js, Kenney assets and some random space image from Web, jsfxr, gooseninja.itch.io

Dedicated to:
To all the military and soldiers (and their supporters) who defend their Home. Come back safe and unharmed, Heroes!

Thanks: 
 РПГ.УКР for moral support.
